text: Outside of flashbacks and dropped plotlines, American Horror Story is probably best known for its characters. Engaging, disturbing, and heartbreaking, these characters spread across seven seasons of Ryan Murphy and Brad Falchuk's horror anthology series and regularly do everything in their power to hurt each other. The upcoming eighth season, American Horror Story : Apocalypse, will be a mashup of the series'two most popular seasons, Murder House ( Season 1 ) and Coven ( Season 3 ), and bring those season's favorite characters to the forefront once again. Like a fanfiction come to fruition, Apocalypse is bound to feature some incredibly meta character moments.
